Office of the Dean of Students     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Office of the Dean of Students      Office of the Dean of Students   Main Menu    About           Our Work, Mission and Values    Our Team    Student Handbook    Policies    Student Government    Religious Workers' Association    Request a Presentation    Location         Assistance           Academic Concerns    Health & Personal Concerns    Campus Life    Faculty & Staff Resources    U & I Care         Community Standards           Academic Integrity    Personal & Community Integrity    Community Standards Forms    Community Standards Process    Get Involved    Record Requests    Assessment & Reports         Student Veterans           Benefits and Forms    Get Connected    Resources for Students and Families    FAQs    Contact Student Veteran Affairs         Student Legal     Eyebrow menu    Veteran Forms    Community Standards Forms    U & I Care    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Office of the Dean of Students    Student Veterans    Get Connected        Get Connected       Get Connected      Going back to school after having served in the military can be an incredible culture shock. Having people around you who understand your experiences because they walked similar paths is a great support system. Thus, an important component of our work is connecting students with other veteran and military-connected students on campus.
